alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 600 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Chipley to 11 miles southeast of Marianna. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Cottondale, Alford, Steele City, Sink Creek, Ocheesee, Kynesville, Star, Simsville, Cottondale Airport, Alliance and Union City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
